data.name: Rogue
data.description:
The Alliance - Rogue [E]
Units:
-30% buy cost
+10% attack rate
-2 armor

Buildings:
+100 attack range

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Damage

Magic:
Curse (Gives 1 enemy 25% chance to miss)
Rage (+15% attack rate for 60s)
Shockwave (Deals 125 dmg in a line)

Traits: Cheap and abundant units with significant battle experience. Trained to fight without any honour and show no mercy. But there is a limit what skill can do and the lack of high quality gear has its toll.

Difficulty: Advanced

auras.name: Trade Routes Aura
auras.description:
+30% move speed, x2 income from neutral buildings
(doesn't affect Shrines)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Devotion Aura
auras.description:
+6 unit armor
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Endurance Aura
auras.description:
+25% unit attack speed
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Widowmaker [X]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Field Upgrade

Widowmaker replaces Mortar
Siege Unit (Range)
+40% attack rate
+800 HP
Abilities:
Multishot (Orb Effect)
(attacks can hit 3 targets)
Blood and Plunder (Support Spell)
(gives friendly units in 650 AoE random items)
Upgrades used:
Gunpowder
Leather Armor
HE Rounds
Field Upgrade

Type: Late Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Bandit Mage [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of HE Rounds

Bandit Mage replaces Pegasus Rider
Support Unit (Ground/Range)
+15% attack rate
+300 HP
Abilities:
Acid Bomd (Disable Spell)
(-6 armor in 350 AoE)
(does not affect Special unit)
Demoralising Scream (Disable Spell)
(-15% damage in 900 AoE)
(does not affect Special unit)
Upgrades used:
Steel Knives
Leather Armor
Critical Hit
Animal War Training
Field Upgrade

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Ambush Tactics [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Critical Strike

Reduces spell damage to Enforcer, Javelineer, Rogue Wizard and Marauder by 20% and increases their hit points by 25 and armor by 2. Your units become invisible.

Type: Anti Magic Damage / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

bonuses.name: Axemen [A]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Throwing Knives
+1 level of Critical Hit

Axe Thrower replaces Javelineer
Ranged Unit
+20% attack rate
+75 HP
Abilities:
Acid Spitball (Damage Spell)
(400 damage to Air unit)
Crucial Hit (Passive Skill)
(20% for 30 damage, 0.8s stun)
(affects organic units only)
(has half duration on Heroes)
(doesn't affect Special unit)
Upgrades used:
Steel Knives
Leather Armor
Critical Hit
Shield Training
Field Upgrade
Throwing Knives

Type: Minor Anti Air / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Banished Sorcerers [S]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Bandit

Sorcerer replaces Wizard
Spellcaster
+5% attack rate
+50 HP
+75 MP
Abilities:
Divine Shield (Support Spell)
(+200 armor to friendly unit for 3/4/5/6 sec)
(affects non-Hero units only)
Upgrades used:
Black Magic (Upgrades Abilities)
Leather Armor
Shield Training
Field Upgrade

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Stolen Relic [C]
bonuses.description:
Cursed Relic, capable of healing your units. It is activated by killing enemy heroes, or performing a blood ritual. The missing parts of the Relic can be stolen from other players, or bought on black market. The Relic is a powerful artefact, but beware, it's bloodlust is insatiable.

Type: Unit Utility / Unique Bonus

upgrades.name: Upgrade Relic
upgrades.description:
Gives:
Increases the passive regeneration to 6 HP/second, and blood loss to 30 HP/second. Increases the chance of Blood Drain.

upgrades.name: Black Market
upgrades.description:
Gives:
Buy the missing parts on the Black Market (Can only be bought once!).

bonuses.name: Dishonored Knights [D]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Inspiration Aura

Black Knight replaces Marauder
Siege Unit
+3 armor
+150 HP
Abilities:
Rallying Cry (Support Spell)
(+4 armor in 500 AoE)
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
Spell Resistance (Passive Skill)
(30% spell damage reduction)
Upgrades used:
Steel Knives
Leather Armor
Critical Strike
Inspiration Aura
Animal War Training
Field Upgrade

Type: Mid Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Maximum Offence [F]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Animal War Training

Black Gryphon replaces Pegasus Rider
Air Unit
+200 HP
Abilities:
Storm Hammer (Orb Effect)
(gives 50% chance to do 75 damage in 200 AoE)
(does not affect Special unit)
Upgrades used:
Steel Knives
Leather Armor
Critical Hit
Animal War Training

Type: Air Power

bonuses.name: Poisoned Blades [E]
bonuses.description:
Increases Enforcer and Marauder attack rate by 5% and allows them to poison their target dealing 4/8/12 damage per second.
(affects organic units only)
(upgrades together with Fort)

Type: Magic Damage

bonuses.name: The Last Guardian [Q]
bonuses.description:
Medivh replaces Sally

Hero Unit (Ranged)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Nuker
Can learn:
Void Rain (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage
(225-375 area of effect)
(20 second cooldown)
Void Leech (Damage Spell)
250-400 damage over 5s
(250-400 area of effect)
Stasis Field (Self Spell)
heals 8000-14000 HP over 5s
Void Golem (Summoning Spell)
summons Golem for 30-90s

Type: Hero Power

bonuses.name: Veteran Scum [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Shield Training

Brigand replaces Enforcer
Melee Unit
+125 HP
+10% attack rate
Abilities:
Flurry (Self Spell)
(+20% attack rate for 15 sec)
Cleaving Strike (Passive Skill)
(15% for 30 dmg in 125 AoE)
Upgrades used:
Critical Strike
Steel Knives
Leather Armor
Shield Training
Field Upgrade

Type: Early Push / Unit Power

towerUpgrades.name: Critical Hit
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage on each attack
Affects: Javelineer and Pegasus Rider

Lv1: 10% to do 2.25x damage
Lv2: 20% to do 2.25x damage
Lv3: 30% to do 2.25x damage
Lv4: 35% to do 2.75x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Critical Strike
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage on each attack
Affects: Enforcer, Marauder and Bandit

Lv1: 10% to do 2x damage
Lv2: 20% to do 2x damage
Lv3: 30% to do 2x damage
Lv4: 35% to do 2.5x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Field Upgrade
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: upgrade after a kill
Affects: All non-Hero organic units

Lv1: can get Lv1 items
Lv2: can get Lv2 items
Lv3: can get Lv3 items
Lv4: can get Lv4 items

towerUpgrades.name: Inspiration Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage to nearby units
Affects: Marauder

Lv1: +10% damage in 400 AoE
Lv2: +20% damage in 500 AoE
Lv3: +30% damage in 600 AoE
Lv4: +40% damage in 700 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Animal War Training
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus hit points and attack rate
Affects: Marauder and Pegasus Rider

Lv1: +25 hit points, +5% attack rate
Lv2: +50 hit points, +10% attack rate
Lv3: +75 hit points, +15% attack rate
Lv4: +100 hit points, +20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: HE Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to stun on each attack
Affects: Mortar and Mortar Tower
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 15% chance for 2.2 sec stun
Lv2: 30% chance for 2.4 sec stun
Lv3: 45% chance for 2.6 sec stun
Lv4: 60% chance for 2.8 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Throwing Knives
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 1 knife every 10 sec
Affects: Javelineer
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 30 damage per knife
Lv2: 60 damage per knife
Lv3: 90 damage per knife
Lv4: 120 damage per knife

spells.name: Octopus Discharge - [Level 1]
spells.description: Deals 75 damage to nearby enemy units.

towerUpgrades.name: Shield Training
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: increases base evasion and bonus HP
Affects: Enforcer, Javelineer, Rogue Wizard and Bandit

Lv1: +5% evasion and 25 HP
Lv2: +10% evasion and 50 HP
Lv3: +15% evasion and 75 HP
Lv4: +20% evasion and 100 HP

towerUpgrades.name: Bandit
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in each wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Profit Aura (bonus gold)
+1/+2/+3/+4 gold per kill
Lv2: has Bleed (reduce unit's speed)
15%/30%/45% chance, -25% speed for 60 sec
Lv3: has Big Smoke Grenade (chance to miss)
45%/60% miss for 6/8 sec in 175 AoE
Lv4: has Bribe (controls enemy units)
One enemy unit every 60 sec

t1spell.name: Cannon Barrage [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoF.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Holy Fire [X]
t2spell.description:
Fires cannons in all directions.
Each blast deals 700 damage.
Repeats after 3 seconds delay but with 50% damage
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

fort.name: Fort (Lv3)
fort.description:
Gives:
Can train Special Unit
+5000 Fort hit points
+200 Fort mana
+4 Fort armor

skills.description:

skills.description:

skills.description:

Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.name: Anti-Hero Sentry (Lv1)
skills.description: Attacks do 2x damage to Heroes.

skills.name: Anti-Hero Sentry (Lv1)
skills.description: Attacks do 2x damage to Heroes.

skills.description:
15% chance to stun for 2.2 seconds.

heroes.name: Train Dark Knight
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
War Stomp (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 2.5-4s stun
(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Battle Cry (Support Spell)
12-30% damage bonus
(200-500 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)
(80 second cooldown)

Devotion Aura (Support Aura)
2-8 armor bonus

Heavy Shield (Passive Skill)
16-40% to block an attack

skills.name: War Stomp - [Level 5]
skills.description: Slams the ground, dealing <AOws,DataA4> damage to nearby enemy land units and stunning them for <AOws,Dur4> seconds.

skills.name: Battle Cry - [Level 1]
skills.description: Gives friendly nearby units a 12% bonus to damage for 20 seconds.

heroes.name: Bounty Hunter
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs Heroes
Weak Vs All Units, Buildings

Role: Assassin

Can learn:
Bounty Hunter (Passive Skill)
get extra gold for a kill
(40-70% chance to get 3-15 gold per unit)
(50-200 gold per Hero)

Rare Venom (Orb Effect)
20-50% to poison for 60s
(affects organic Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Stun Grenade (Damage Spell)
125-250 damage, 5.5-7s stun
(250-400 area of effect)
(45 second cooldown)

Evasion (Passive Skill)
13-25% to evade an attack

heroes.name: High Inquisitor
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Inquisition (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage, 6-12 units
(affects organic units only)
(20 second cooldown)

Holy Light (Healing Spell)
200-500 HP to 3 units
(25 second cooldown)

Pyroblast (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line
(700-1000 wave distance)
(30 second cooldown)

Scarlet Aegis (Support Spell)
4-10 armor bonus
(550-700 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)
(45 second cooldown)

skills.name: Inquisition - [Level 4]
skills.description: Calls forth a cone of lightning on a target enemy unit, hitting up to 6 enemy units for 225 damage.

skills.name: Battle Cry - [Level 1]
skills.description: Gives friendly nearby units a 12% bonus to damage for 20 seconds.

skills.name: Holy Light - [Level 4]
skills.description: Heals up to 3 units for 200 hit points.

skills.name: Pyroblast - [Level 7]
skills.description: Sends a gigantic wave which deals 225 damage to each enemy land unit in a line.

heroes.name: Siege Tower
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Ranged/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Reinforcements (Sumonning Spell)
calls down 4-9 Mercenaries
(90 second cooldown)

Spear Garrison (Passive Skill)
launches 1-7 spears at units
(50 damage for buildings)

Endless Barrage (Self Spell)
12-30% attack rate bonus
(60 second cooldown)

Composite Armor (Passive Skill)
12-30% to block an attack

skills.name: Storm Elemental - [Level 1]
skills.description: Summons Storm Elemental for 30 seconds.

skills.name: Spear Garrison
skills.description: Fires down streams of flame, lighting nearby enemies on fire.

skills.name: Overcharge - [Level 1]
skills.description: Increases the attack rate by 12%. Lasts 20 seconds.

skills.name: Blizzard - [Level 4]
skills.description: Calls down freezing ice shards which deal 300 damage to units in an area.

skills.name: Void Leech - [Level 1]
skills.description: Calls down void storm, which deals 25 damage per second.

skills.name: Stasis Field - [Level 1]
skills.description: Protects from all damage and heals 4000 hit points over 10 seconds.

skills.name: Rain of Chaos - [Level 1]
skills.description: Calls down multiple Infernals from the sky.
